sentences.en: At one end of the party are some undaunted neocons, keen still to slay monsters across the seas.
sentences.cn: 共和党内的一端是一些无所畏惧的新保守主义者，他们仍然热衷于飘洋过海去斩杀妖魔鬼怪。

sentences.en: Bryant also seemed undaunted , smiling and laughing numerous times during post - game interviews.
sentences.cn: 科比看上去似乎也很无畏, 在后场笑了很多次.

sentences.en: But for those undaunted, here's our guide to circumventing internet censorship.
sentences.cn: 但是对于那些大无畏者，这里是我们的绕过互联网审查的指南。

sentences.en: He seemed undaunted by all the opposition to his idea.
sentences.cn: 尽管他的思想屡遭非难，他似乎仍然百折不挠。

sentences.en: He was genuine and undaunted by hardships.
sentences.cn: 他更是纯正的,不畏艰难困苦的.

sentences.en: He was undaunted by Alonso's massive stride forward in the title battle.
sentences.cn: 汉密尔顿并不畏惧队友阿隆索朝年度冠军迈近了一大步.

sentences.en: Her undaunted spirit did not shrink from the only correct answer.
sentences.cn: 她的大无畏的精神使她不畏惧追求唯一正确的答案.

sentences.en: Oh to struggle against great odds . To meet enemies undaunted.
sentences.cn: 与纷争不和对抗,面对敌人而不畏惧.

sentences.en: The commander bade his men be undaunted in the face of perils.
sentences.cn: 指挥员命令他的战士要临危不惧.

sentences.en: To struggle against great odds, to meet enemies undaunted.
sentences.cn: 与逆境不屈抗争, 以无畏的气势面对敌人.

sentences.en: Undaunted Arthur grabbed the Eagle's claws and the two spiraled downward.
sentences.cn: 亚瑟毫不畏惧,也钳住雕的爪子,于是二者盘旋而下.

sentences.en: Undaunted by his first setback, he decided to try once more.
sentences.cn: 不为最初的失败而动摇, 他决定再试一次.

sentences.en: Undaunted in this war between the gods and the demons.
sentences.cn: 众神和魔鬼之间的英勇战争在此爆发了.

sentences.en: Undaunted, on a subsequent trip I asked her to make it again.
sentences.cn: 我并未恢心, 在随后的一次旅行中,我请这位保加利亚妇女又作了一次.

sentences.en: Undaunted, Sare said, " Okay, Daddy, who had more fun? "
sentences.cn: 莎拉毫不气馁,又问: “ 那么, 爸爸, 谁觉得更好玩 呢 ? ”

sentences.en: Undaunted, we applied for adoption and, within a year, he arrived.
sentences.cn: 我们并未气馁, 于是申请领养孩子.不到一年, 他来到我们家中.

trans.tran_cn: 顽强的，不惧怕的，无畏的
trans.tran_en: not afraid of continuing to try to do something in spite of difficulties or danger
